items.sentence: It\'s hard to believe that Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary was in love with him.
It\'s possible that Tom was able to convince Mary to do his laundry for him.
Since Tom was speaking in French, I couldn\'t understand what he was saying.
When my doctor told me to eat more vegetables, he didn\'t mean french fries.
I bought an apple and an orange. I ate the apple and gave the orange to Tom.
I\'m not an expert, so my answer to your question is just an educated guess.
Tom is going to be upset when he finds out that Mary forgot to pay the rent.
Tom doesn\'t need to worry about a thing. Mary will take care of everything.
The best way to learn a language is to live in a country where it\'s spoken.
This never would\'ve happened if you\'d done it the way I told you to do it.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly what time Mary\'s train pulled out of the station.
I\'ve been so worried about you that I haven\'t been sleeping well at night.
Tom and Mary started kissing each other as soon as the light was turned off.
How did you know that Tom was planning to eat at that restaurant last night?
Why don\'t you take this medicine for a few days and let\'s see if it works?
Tom said he wouldn\'t have gone to Mary\'s party even if she\'d invited him.
I wonder whether or not Tom forgot to tell Mary she was supposed to do that.
We had to fire Tom because he wasn\'t able to do the job we hired him to do.
Since Tom wanted the chocolate much more than she did, Mary let him have it.
The reporters started asking Tom questions as soon as he left the courtroom.
